availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elizabeth Smith Sidle (Harrison County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Joseph Smith and Emily Smith. Married to George Sidle in Harrison County, Kentucky, on January 29, 1861. Mother of Robert Sidle. Attended school in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 80A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 222A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 7287.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film 000216889.
